trans-unit.source: Defines the security configuration settings for message sent using HTTP.
Gets or sets the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms used to secure an HTTP message.
A valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite"></xref> value that specifies the message encryption and key-wrap algorithms used to secure an HTTP message.

Specifies the type of credential to be used when performing client authentication using message-based security or <xref uid="langword_csharp_TransportWithMessageCredential" name="TransportWithMessageCredential" href=""></xref>.

A valid <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType> value that specifies the type of credential to be used when performing client authentication using message-based security or <xref uid="langword_csharp_TransportWithMessageCredential" name="TransportWithMessageCredential" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the service credential is provisioned at the client out-of-band, or is obtained from the service to the client through a process of negotiation.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the service credential is provisioned at the client out-of-band; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.

A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
